# Copilot Assets Sync Targets
# ============================
#
# This file lists the target repositories that will receive synced
# Copilot customization assets (agents, instructions, prompts, skills).
#
# FORMAT:
#   - One absolute local filesystem path per line
#   - Lines starting with # are comments (ignored)
#   - Empty lines are ignored
#   - Paths with spaces are supported (no special escaping required)
#
# USAGE:
#   1. Copy this file to your repository root as: sync-targets.txt
#   2. Add the absolute path to each cloned repository you want to sync to
#   3. Run: node .github/skills/sync-copilot-assets/scripts/sync-copilot-assets.mjs --dry-run
#   4. Run: node .github/skills/sync-copilot-assets/scripts/sync-copilot-assets.mjs
#
# WARNING:
#   Sync performs FULL OVERWRITE - files in targets that don't exist in
#   source will be DELETED. Always use --dry-run first!
#
# ============================================================================
